Headline: #151 Sheridan Temporary Northbound Reroute near Washington/Dearborn
ShortDescription: Northbound #151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Dearborn, Monroe, State and Washington, due to street blockage near Washington/Dearborn.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Dearborn, Monroe, State and Washington, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Washington/Dearborn.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #49 Western Temporary Reroute at Western/14th

Headline: #47 47th Temporary Reroute near 47th/Shields
ShortDescription: #47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to flooding near 47th/Shields.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip? 

#47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions.

  • Eastbound buses will operate via 47th, Racine, 51st, Princeton, then resume their normal route on 47th.
  • Westbound buses will operate via 47th, Wells, 51st, Racine, then resume their normal route on 47th.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to flooding near 47th/Shields. (Revised)

Buses are rerouted due to flooding near 26th/Western.

Headline: #29 State Temporary Reroute near State/63rd

  • Northbound buses will operate via State, Marquette, Wentworth, 59th, then resume their normal route on State.

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to flooding near State/63rd.
